data.name: Serifs To Sans-Serifs (monospaces included)
data.description: Replaces ugly serifs to sans-serif typefaces (mostly Windows fonts). Also tunes monospaced fonts. Applies globally.

data.name: KIT Ilias Dark
Twitter // Minimal & Color Override
data.description: Just makes the light twitter theme a little more minimal and a little easier on the eyes. This also overrides the purple display color and makes the timeline and some other things a bit wider and hides the sidebar. This will not work on either of the dark twitter themes since I changed colors of the light theme, but the section that changes the purple display color is in a different section so it's easy to find.

data.name: Wikipedia Minimal Dark
data.description: made for the MinervaNeue wikipedia style, it won't look as good on the regular style, this can be toggled on Wikipedia's preferences / appereance once you're logged on
